name: Milk, Milk, Milk.
description:
Play as Millie as they traverse the day stepping out of their comfort zone to buy some milk and eat it.

Talk to unfamiliar faces and try and enjoy your trip to the milk store.

Made by me and nick for 48 hour artcenter game jam.

i tried my best...

HEAVILY and i mean HEAVILY inspired by the games of Nikita Kryukov
